segments.content: I've just got back from holiday in French Brittany 😎, so we're covering 2 weeks of news in this edition.
segments.sourceMdx: I've just got back from holiday in French Brittany 😎, so we're covering 2 weeks of news in this edition.
segments.translated_content: 我刚从法国布列塔尼度假归来 😎，因此本期将涵盖两周的新闻动态。

segments.content: I thought it was going to be a quiet summer, but there have been quite a few releases and plenty of articles on Server Components! 😄
segments.sourceMdx: I thought it was going to be a quiet summer, but there have been quite a few releases and plenty of articles on Server Components! 😄
segments.translated_content: 本以为会是平静的夏季，但Server Components相关的新版本发布和深度文章却层出不穷！😄

segments.content:
* Editing UI for your Markdown files
* UI for MDX components
* Supports static (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR)
* Option for visual editing (live-preview)
* Build with reusable blocks
segments.sourceMdx:
- Editing UI for your Markdown files
- UI for MDX components
- Supports static (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR)
- Option for visual editing (live-preview)
- Build with reusable blocks
segments.translated_content:
- 为Markdown文件提供可视化编辑界面
- 支持MDX组件编辑
- 兼容静态生成(SSG)与服务器端渲染(SSR)
- 可选实时预览编辑功能
- 基于可复用区块构建
或运行 `npx create-tina-app@latest` 后访问 `localhost:3000/admin`

segments.content: Comprehensive, well-illustrated article on React 18 and its impact on performance. Explains how Concurrent React works and its impact on metrics such as Total Blocking Time and Interaction to Next Paint. Also presents other new features such as the Transition API, React Server Components, Suspense and the new React cache.
segments.sourceMdx: Comprehensive, well-illustrated article on React 18 and its impact on performance. Explains how Concurrent React works and its impact on metrics such as Total Blocking Time and Interaction to Next Paint. Also presents other new features such as the Transition API, React Server Components, Suspense and the new React cache.
segments.translated_content: 关于React 18性能优化的全面图解文章。详解并发渲染机制及其对总阻塞时间(TBT)、下次绘制交互时间(INP)等指标的影响，同时介绍过渡API、React服务端组件、Suspense及新版React缓存等特性。

segments.content: New CSS-in-JS library inspired by the DX offered by Chakra UI, and compatible with React Server Components. The library is based on a unique hybride method that combines the best of zero-runtime CSS-in-JS and traditional runtime solutions. We'll have to study all this, and see how this library stands up to [Panda CSS](https://panda-css.com/) from the Chakra team.
segments.sourceMdx: New CSS-in-JS library inspired by the DX offered by Chakra UI, and compatible with React Server Components. The library is based on a unique hybride method that combines the best of zero-runtime CSS-in-JS and traditional runtime solutions. We'll have to study all this, and see how this library stands up to [Panda CSS](https://panda-css.com/) from the Chakra team.
segments.translated_content: 受Chakra UI开发者体验启发的新型CSS-in-JS库，兼容React服务端组件。该库采用独特的混合方案，结合零运行时CSS-in-JS与传统运行时方案的优势。我们将持续关注其与Chakra团队[Panda CSS](https://panda-css.com/)的差异化竞争。

segments.content:
* 🐦 [DevRel Matt Carroll rejoined the React team](https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode/status/1681342638816112641)
* 👀 [How to Setup Redwood Experimental React Server Components](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/react-server-components-rsc/5081)
* 👀 [React-Query-Nextjs](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1680153231853223938): React-Query experimental support for the Next.js App Directory.
* 📜 [My take on the current React & Server Components controversy](https://phryneas.de/react-server-components-controversy): Lenz loves the React Server Components but explains his frustration as a maintainer of Apollo Client and Redux Toolkit.
* 📜 [Demystifying React Server Components with NextJS 13 App Router](https://demystifying-rsc.vercel.app/): a great demo application with well-illustrated notes explaining how Server Components work, including many code and network payload samples.
* 📜 [5 Common Pitfalls with Server Components in Next13 (with examples)](https://www.propelauth.com/post/5-common-pitfalls-with-server-components-in-next13-with-examples): well-illustrated article presenting the most common errors when using Server Components.
* 📜 [Trimming typography with Capsize](https://www.skovy.dev/blog/using-capsize-with-stitches): explains how to trim and normalise whitespaces around your fonts to facilitate alignment, in a React context.
* 📜 [SvelteJS: My ecosystem is bigger than yours](https://hackmd.io/@roguegpu/r1RKQMdt3): interesting criticism of React in favour of Svelte, which doesn't need as much of an ecosystem.
* 📜 [Why Server Components - A Brief History of Web](https://www.perssondennis.com/articles/why-server-components-a-brief-history-of-web)
* 📜 [A Visual Guide to Prefetching in Next.js 13](https://www.builder.io/blog/prefetching-nextjs-visual-guide)
* 📜 [Autosave form inputs with Remix](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-form-autosave)
* 📜 [Ariakit is now stable](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/stable)
* 📜 [A pattern for chaining nextjs middlewares](https://raphael.badia.cc/posts/a-pattern-for-chaining-middlewares)
* 📜 [Embracing Polymorphism for Flexible Components](https://brightinventions.pl/blog/embracing-polymorphism-for-flexible-components/)
* 📦 [Fresh 1.3 – Simplified Route Components and More](https://twitter.com/deno_land/status/1681340646723039232)
* 📦 [Next.js 13.4.10](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v13.4.10)
* 📦 [Million.js 2.5 - Compile time macros](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1679698685603774464)
* 📦 [Remix Development Tools](https://twitter.com/AlemTuzlak59192/status/1680538200702369794)
* 📦 [Remix-Hono](https://github.com/sergiodxa/remix-hono)
* 📦 [Remix-JSON-Routes](https://github.com/brophdawg11/remix-json-routes)
* 📦 [Vercel Platforms Starter Kit - Template for building multi-tenant applications using Next.js App Router](https://vercel.com/blog/platforms-starter-kit)
* 📦 [MDX Editor - WYSIWYG React component for Markdown editing](https://mdxeditor.dev/)
* 📦 [Rewind-UI - React-TailwindCSS component library](https://rewind-ui.dev/)
* 📦 [Featurevisor - Git-based Feature flags, with React bindings](https://github.com/fahad19/featurevisor)
* 🎥 [Tailwind Connect 2023 — Keynote](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLkxRnRQtDE): annonce de Catalyst, un React UI kit
* 🎥 [Legend: The Ultimate React State Manager?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4TH77SMOG8)

segments.translated_content:
- 🐦 [开发者关系专家Matt Carroll重新加入React团队](https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode/status/1681342638816112641)

- 📜 [为什么需要服务端组件——Web简史](https://www.perssondennis.com/articles/why-server-components-a-brief-history-of-web)

- 📜 [用Remix实现表单自动保存](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-form-autosave)
- 📜 [Ariakit发布稳定版](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/stable)
- 📜 [Next.js中间件链式调用模式](https://raphael.badia.cc/posts/a-pattern-for-chaining-middlewares)
- 📜 [拥抱多态性实现灵活组件](https://brightinventions.pl/blog/embracing-polymorphism-for-flexible-components/)
- 📦 [Fresh 1.3——简化路由组件等更新](https://twitter.com/deno_land/status/1681340646723039232)
- 📦 [Next.js 13.4.10发布](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/releases/tag/v13.4.10)
- 📦 [Million.js 2.5——编译时宏](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1679698685603774464)

- 🎥 [Legend：终极React状态管理器？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4TH77SMOG8)

segments.content: The new SDK 49 has just been released. Many new features have been announced, including my favourites:
segments.sourceMdx: The new SDK 49 has just been released. Many new features have been announced, including my favourites:
segments.translated_content: 新版SDK 49已重磅推出，主要亮点包括：

segments.content:
* React Native 0.72.3, React Native Web 0.19.6
* Expo Router v2.0
* Network debugging, VS Code debugging
* React devtools built-in
* Environment variables
* Local Expo Modules
* EAS Insights
segments.sourceMdx:
- React Native 0.72.3, React Native Web 0.19.6
- Expo Router v2.0
- Network debugging, VS Code debugging
- React devtools built-in
- Environment variables
- Local Expo Modules
- EAS Insights
segments.translated_content:
- React Native 0.72.3与React Native Web 0.19.6支持
- Expo Router v2.0
- 网络调试与VS Code调试功能
- 内置React开发者工具
- 环境变量支持
- 本地Expo模块
- EAS Insights分析工具

segments.content: Along with SDK 49, Expo is also announcing the release of Expo Router v2 with many enhancements, including:
segments.sourceMdx: Along with SDK 49, Expo is also announcing the release of Expo Router v2 with many enhancements, including:
segments.translated_content: 伴随SDK 49同步发布的Expo Router v2带来多项增强：

segments.content:
* TypeScript support
* Static routes, SEO, Head metadata
* Async routes
* Universal Linking, handoff
* CSS and Styling
segments.sourceMdx:
- TypeScript support
- Static routes, SEO, Head metadata
- Async routes
- Universal Linking, handoff
- CSS and Styling
segments.translated_content:
- TypeScript支持
- 静态路由、SEO优化与Head元数据
- 异步路由
- 通用链接与Handoff功能
- CSS与样式优化

🧑‍💼 [**Passionfroot - 高级全栈工程师(Remix方向) - 年薪16万欧元+，柏林/远程**](https://passionfroot.recruitee.com/o/senior-fullstack-engineer)

segments.content: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.sourceMdx: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.translated_content: Passionfroot致力于通过YouTube、播客、社交媒体和新闻通讯赋能新一代独立创业者。加入我们，共同打造帮助全球内容创作者建立可扩展、可持续业务的工具。

segments.content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.sourceMdx: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.translated_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 高级React Native开发工程师 - 完全远程，B2B合同月薪2.1-3.2万波兰兹罗提(净收入)**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.sourceMdx: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.translated_content: 您是否希望参与全球使用最广泛的应用开发？是否渴望共同塑造React Native技术的未来？加入Callstack团队，与React及React Native领域的领军者共事。访问官网了解更多详情。我们期待您的申请——请尽情展示您的才华！

segments.content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is \~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe\_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.sourceMdx: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.translated_content: 我们开放多个React Native开发岗位！年薪约16万美元外加10%奖金。应聘者需具备RN实际项目经验且常驻美国。私信[@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i)了解详情，请备注"React周刊推荐"。
